message: I think this is a fair starting point, considering the inflation we'll face in future rounds. Let's see what you think.
Considering the 20% inflation, I think this is a more reasonable split. If we delay, I'll lose even more value.
I understand the inflation impacts you more, but this is a compromise. If we keep delaying, we'll both lose more.
Inflation is really eating into my share. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.
